title: AI is moving beyond IT into physical operations, says Anant Maheshwari
description: Artificial intelligence is now enhancing physical operations, moving beyond IT. This 'physical AI' allows systems to learn and create new rules, impacting factories, buildings, and infrastructure globally. Honeywell sees this as an opportunity to accelerate talent development, addressing global shortages. India is highlighted as a key innovation hub, with its local model influencing multinational strategies worldwide.
content:

title: Maharashtra's $5 trillion ambition: Scaling manufacturing and services
description: Maharashtra is embracing artificial intelligence, seeing it as a tool to boost human skills. The state is enhancing its infrastructure and policies to attract global investment. Maharashtra aims to become a trillion-dollar economy by 2030 and a five-trillion-dollar economy by 2047. The focus is on integrating manufacturing and services for inclusive growth across all districts.
content:

title: US Army Leaders Say Soldiers Are Drowning in Data. AI Seen As Solution.
description: Personnel won't be able to fully process all the data available on the modern battlefield. That's where artificial intelligence applications come in.
content:
Army leaders say the modern battlefield is so saturated with sensors and networked weapons generating more data than soldiers can realistically process on their own that artificial intelligence is needed to meaningfully sort it all.

title: Anthropic hits a $380B valuation as it heightens competition with OpenAI
description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic says it is now valued at $380 billion, cementing its position alongside rival OpenAI and Elon Musk’s SpaceX in a trio of the world’s most valuable startups that investors will be watching closely this year to see if they will become publicly traded on Wall Street.…

title: Josh Brown buys CBRE after AI disruption fears drive steep sell-off
description: Shares of CBRE plunged 16% this week on fears that artificial intelligence could weigh on office real estate demand.
content: Josh Brown, CEO of Ritholtz Wealth Management, told CNBC's " Halftime Report " on Friday that he added to his CBRE position after the stock plunged on investor fears that artificial intelligence could weigh on office real estate demand. CBRE and a sl... [1287 chars]

title: India-France Business Dialogue Sets Stage for AI Impact Summit in Delhi
description: An IndiaFrance Business Dialogue in London set the stage for the upcoming AI Impact Summit in New Delhi next week, the first international artificial intelligence gathering of its kind to be held in the Global South anchored on the principles of people, planet and progress.
content: An India–France Business Dialogue in London has laid the groundwork for the AI Impact Summit scheduled to take place in New Delhi next week. The summit is described as the first international artificial intelligence gathering of its kind to be hosted... [4012 chars]

title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Powering India's Cultural Renaissance
description: From the digitisation of palm-leaf manuscripts to real-time translation across India's extraordinary linguistic diversity, artificial intelligence is quietly reshaping how Indians encounter their own heritage, and how the world understands India.
content:
New Delhi:
